content:
That's wonderful! It's great to hear that you've had a positive experience with online book clubs in the past. "The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo" is a fantastic book, and I'm sure the discussion was lively and engaging.

I'm thrilled for Rachel and her book launch event today! Please do give her a big congratulations from me, and I hope the event goes wonderfully. It's always exciting to celebrate a friend's achievement, especially in the literary world.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more recommendations or have any other questions. I'll be here, happy to help. Have a fantastic time at the book launch, and I hope you enjoy the rest of your day!
